column1: Delčevo (Macedonian: Делчево [ˈdɛɫtʃɛvɔ] (listen)) is a small town in the eastern mountainous part of North Macedonia. It is the municipal seat of the eponymous municipality. A festival in celebration of revolutionary leader Gotse Delchev is held every year on August 2.
The town of Delčevo is situated at the foot of Mount Golak on the banks of the Bregalnica river. It is 164 km (102 mi) to the east of Skopje along the A3 road
